description:
Let music editor and producer Skye Lewin show you a selection of audio editing
techniques for cutting music to picture in this course on Pro Tools. He covers
the basics of timecode, syncing a QuickTime movie with the Pro Tools timeline,
alignment of music to picture, editing music, and editorial techniques that
may require editing rights. The course also covers creating alternative edits,
conforming edits, and exporting QuickTime movies for presentation.
title: Music Editing for TV and Film in Pro Tools
